name: Grapple Platformer
description:
Headphones or stereos with a subwoofer are recommended.

Please do not fall outside the platform, which is an "undefined behavior" 😁

---

Controls:

A/D, <-/-> to move left or right. Space to jump.

Mouse left lick to shoot out a laser grapple. Release it to retract the grapple. The grapple would pull the player towards an immobile object, such as walls, or pull movable objects towards the player.  Holding mouse left click will give you a slow motion to aim the grapple.

Click options button or ESC on the top left to toggle settings panel.

Hit Apply button to apply settings changes. Click or press ESC again to close the panel.
